LanguageData.AncientAirConditioner.label: ancient air conditioner
LanguageData.AncientAirConditioner.description: An ancient air conditioning machine. Its internals were smashed long ago and what wasn't looted has rusted away in the time since.
LanguageData.AncientAPC.label: ancient ruined APC
LanguageData.AncientAPC.description: The remains of an ancient armoured troop carrier which was destroyed by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.
LanguageData.AncientATM.label: ancient ATM
LanguageData.AncientATM.description: An ancient ATM. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientCentipedeShell.label: ancient centipede shell
LanguageData.AncientCentipedeShell.description: A shell from a smashed centipede. It has been deteriorating for many years and all the useful components have disintegrated.
LanguageData.AncientContainer.label: ancient container
LanguageData.AncientContainer.description: A large container from some ancient freight carrying vehicle. It has long since been looted and deteriorted into uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientDropshipEngine.label: ancient dropship engine
LanguageData.AncientDropshipEngine.description: An ancient dropship engine. It probably came off a military troop carrier. Its delicate internals are rusted to uselessness, and the valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientFence.label: ancient fence
LanguageData.AncientFence.description: An ancient fence made of reinforced concrete posts joined by concrete panels.
LanguageData.AncientGiantWheel.label: ancient giant wheel
LanguageData.AncientGiantWheel.description: A giant wheel which came off some large vehicle many ages ago. The rubber has disintegrated away and the metal is twisted and rusted.
LanguageData.AncientHydrant.label: ancient hydrant
LanguageData.AncientHydrant.description: An ancient hydrant. Heavily rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientJetEngine.label: ancient jet engine
LanguageData.AncientJetEngine.description: An ancient jet engine, probably detached from a large airplane. Its delicate internals are rusted to uselessness, and the valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientKitchenSink.label: ancient kitchen sink
LanguageData.AncientKitchenSink.description: An ancient kitchen sink made of some non-metallic fiber-sheet material. It is badly deteriorated and there's no way to salvage anything from it.\n\nHow it got here must be a long story.
LanguageData.AncientLargeCrate.label: ancient large crate
LanguageData.AncientLargeCrate.description: A large crate which was abandoned ages ago. It's too rusted to store anything.
LanguageData.AncientLargeRustedEngineBlock.label: ancient macro-engine block
LanguageData.AncientLargeRustedEngineBlock.descriptio: An large, ancient engine block from some giant vehicle or power source. It's rusted through, and all the useful components are gone. No repair could salvage this.
LanguageData.AncientLongCrate.label: ancient long crate
LanguageData.AncientLongCrate.description: A long, empty crate which was abandoned ages ago. It's too rusted to store anything.
LanguageData.AncientMechanoidShell.label: ancient mechanoid shell
LanguageData.AncientMechanoidShell.description: A shell from a smashed mechanoid. It has been deteriorating for many years and the useful components have disintegrated.
LanguageData.AncientMechDropBeacon.label: ancient mech drop beacon
LanguageData.AncientMechDropBeacon.description: The broken shell of a mech drop beacon. Its useful components are missing and the shell has deteriorated after many years.
LanguageData.AncientMegaCannonBarrel.label: ancient mega-cannon barrel
LanguageData.AncientMegaCannonBarrel.description: A barrel from a long-range cannon for artillery or anti-ship use. When it was new, it must have been frighteningly powerful. Now, it's far beyond repair and every useful component has been looted.
LanguageData.AncientMegaCannonTripod.label: ancient mega-cannon platform
LanguageData.AncientMegaCannonTripod.description: A mounting platform that once held some sort of cannon. It has been broken for many years and every useful component was looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientMicrowave.label: ancient microwave
LanguageData.AncientMicrowave.description: An ancient device for heating food. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientMiniWarwalkerRemains.label: ancient warsprinter remains
LanguageData.AncientMiniWarwalkerRemains.description: The shattered remains of an ancient sub-scale warsprinter. Whatever parts weren't ruined when it was destroyed were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientOven.label: ancient oven
LanguageData.AncientOven.description: An ancient oven. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientPipelineSection.label: ancient pipeline section
LanguageData.AncientPipelineSection.description: A section from an ancient pipeline. It once carried some valuable fluid over long distances. Now it's been looted and deteriorated to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientPipes.label: ancient pipes
LanguageData.AncientPipes.description: A bunch of rusted old pipes. It is hard to say how these ended up here.
LanguageData.AncientPodCar.label: ancient pod car
LanguageData.AncientPodCar.description: An ancient pod car once capable of automated flight. Its valuable parts were looted long ago, and the rest is badly deteriorated.
LanguageData.AncientPostbox.label: ancient postbox
LanguageData.AncientPostbox.description: An ancient postbox, smashed and deteriorated to uselessness. It seems to have been moved here long ago for some unknown reason.
LanguageData.AncientRazorWire.label: ancient razor wire
LanguageData.AncientRazorWire.description: A piece of ancient razor wire. It has been deteriorating for many years and no longer poses any danger.
LanguageData.AncientRefrigerator.label: ancient refrigerator
LanguageData.AncientRefrigerator.description: An ancient refrigerator. It was stripped of interesting parts long ago.
LanguageData.AncientRustedCar.label: ancient car
LanguageData.AncientRustedCar.description: An ancient, broken car. Everything that isn't rusted away was looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientRustedCarFrame.label: ancient car frame
LanguageData.AncientRustedCarFrame.description: An ancient, rusted car frame. The body shell has long since rusted away to nothing.
LanguageData.AncientRustedDropship.label: ancient dropship
LanguageData.AncientRustedDropship.description: The remains of an ancient dropship. The valuable parts were looted long ago and the rest has deteriorated to uselessness.
LanguageData.AncientRustedEngineBlock.label: ancient engine block
LanguageData.AncientRustedEngineBlock.description: An ancient engine block that is rusted through. No repair could salvage this.
LanguageData.AncientRustedJeep.label: ancient troop carrier
LanguageData.AncientRustedJeep.description: An ancient, broken troop carrier. Everything that isn't rusted away was looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientRustedTruck.label: ancient truck
LanguageData.AncientRustedTruck.description: An ancient, broken truck. Everything useful either rusted away or was looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientSecurityTurret.label: ancient security turret
LanguageData.AncientSecurityTurret.description: An ancient, broken security turret. The valuable parts have all been looted or smashed.
LanguageData.AncientShipBeacon.label: ancient nav beacon
LanguageData.AncientShipBeacon.description: An ancient, broken ship navigation beacon. Every useful component was looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientShoppingCart.label: ancient shopping cart
LanguageData.AncientShoppingCart.description: An ancient, rusted shopping cart. How exactly it got here is a mystery, but the story is long and probably quite sad.
LanguageData.AncientSmallCrate.label: ancient small crate
LanguageData.AncientSmallCrate.description: A small, empty crate which was abandoned ages ago. It's too rusted to store anything.
LanguageData.AncientStove.label: ancient stove
LanguageData.AncientStove.description: An ancient stove. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientTank.label: ancient ruined tank
LanguageData.AncientTank.description: The remains of an ancient tank which was destroyed by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.
LanguageData.AncientTankTrap.label: ancient tank trap
LanguageData.AncientTankTrap.description: An defensive fortification for stopping vehicles. It's been deteriorating for many years.
LanguageData.AncientToilet.label: ancient toilet
LanguageData.AncientToilet.description: An ancient toilet. Smashed long ago, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientVendingMachine.label: ancient vending machine
LanguageData.AncientVendingMachine.description: An ancient vending machine. It was smashed ages ago and generations of looters have taken every conceivably useful part. How it ended up here is a mystery.
LanguageData.AncientWarspiderRemains.label: ancient warspider remains
LanguageData.AncientWarspiderRemains.description: The ruined remains of an ancient mid-scale warspider. It has been picked over many times, and there is nothing valuable left to loot.
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerClaw.label: ancient warwalker claw
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerClaw.description: The assault claw of an ancient mid-scale warwalker. This weapon specialized in tearing through heavy plasteel armor at close range. Its valuable components were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerFoot.label: ancient warwalker foot
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerFoot.description: A massive foot from an ancient warwalker. It seems to have been torn free from its owner by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerLeg.label: ancient warwalker leg
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerLeg.description: The shattered leg of a mid-scale warwalker that fell here long ago. It has been picked clean by looters, and no valuable components remain.
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerShell.label: ancient warwalker shell
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerShell.description: Most of the armored shell of a warwalker. It appears to have been torn off by some colossal weapon system. All the valuable parts were looted, and the rest is badly deteriorated.
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerTorso.label: ancient warwalker torso
LanguageData.AncientWarwalkerTorso.description: The torso of a mid-scale warwalker which fell here in ancient days. The valuable parts were looted long ago.
LanguageData.AncientWashingMachine.label: ancient washing machine
LanguageData.AncientWashingMachine.description: An ancient device used for washing textiles. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.
LanguageData.AncientWheel.label: ancient wheel
LanguageData.AncientWheel.description: An ancient wheel from some kind of vehicle. The rubber has deteriorated away and the metal is twisted and rusted.
